Form

public protocol Form

A form to assist in validating ValidatorControl objects’ current states.

Properties
  • entries

    Entries in the form.

    Declaration

    Swift

    var entries: [FormEntry]
  • isValid Default implementation

    Whether or not the entire form is valid.

    Default Implementation

    Declaration

    Swift

    var isValid: Bool

Initializers

    Creates an empty Form.

    Declaration

    init()
  • init(validatables:) Default implementation

    Creates a Form where each Validatable uses its own Validator for validation.

    Default Implementation

    Declaration

    Swift

    init(validatables: [ValidatorControl])

    Parameters

    validatables

    Array of Validatable.
  • init(validatables:validators:) Default implementation

    Creates a Form where each Validatable uses a custom Validator for validation. If validatables and validators have a different number of elements then returns nil.

    Default Implementation

    Declaration

    Swift

    init?(validatables: [ValidatorControl], validators: [Validator])

    Parameters

    validatables

    Array of Validatable.
    validators

    Array of Validator.

Check
  • checkConditions() Default implementation

    Checks the text from each entry in entries.

    Default Implementation

    Declaration

    Swift

    func checkConditions() -> [Condition]?

    Return Value

    An array of conditions that were violated. If no conditions were violated then nil is returned.
